filecoin_growth_impact: Not within our scope of consideration
description: As the Orbit Ambassador for Greater China,  Orbit China organizing frequent online and offline events, booths, and meetups. Since 2023, the team has hosted major Filecoin ecosystem gatherings across universities and tech hubs, coordinating volunteers, translations, and media coverage to grow Filecoin’s visibility and community engagement.
additional_impact: OrbitChina is the most influential marketing brand in the domestic FIL community, with more than three group chats with over 300 members each, and its events have accumulated over 2000 participants.
end_user:
•	Hosted 25+ ecosystem events since 2023 (offline & online)
	•	Partnered with universities including Zhejiang University and Hong Kong Cyberport
	•	Coordinated 100+ volunteers and 50+ speakers
	•	Increased Chinese-speaking community engagement by 40% (Telegram + WeChat groups)
	•	Provided bilingual coverage for Filecoin Orbit and Foundation activities
impressions: The online and offline promotions reached more than 10,000 people.
graduations_or_event_attendees: Each event has more than 100 participants.
